Yes, most of the trendy coffee shops in Berlin serve alternative beverages for non-coffee drinkers. Here are some options:

1. The Barn in Prenzlauer Berg offers a wide selection of teas.

2. St. Oberholz in Mitte offers various types of tea, hot chocolate, and fresh juices.

3. Distrikt Coffee in Mitte serves fresh juices, smoothies, and a variety of tea.

4. Shakespeare and Sons in Friedrichshain offers hot chocolate and various types of tea.

5. Commonground in Kreuzberg offers a variety of fresh juices, smoothies, and tea.

6. Silo Coffee in Friedrichshain serves a variety of teas and hot chocolate.

7. Five Elephant in Kreuzberg offers fresh juices, smoothies, and a selection of tea.

8. Bonanza Coffee Heroes in Prenzlauer Berg serves tea, fresh juices, and hot chocolate.

Most coffee shops also offer non-dairy milk options for those who are lactose intolerant or prefer plant-based drinks.
